entry.title: Saturday: A few clouds. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this morning. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 47 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
